Name: User SignUp
Description: Handles user registration and sign-up processes.

Name: LogIn With Email & Password
Description: Facilitates user authentication and login using the provided email and password credentials of a user.

Name: LogIn With Facebook
Description: Facilitates user authentication and login using Facebook's OAuth (Open Authorization) authentication system. This endpoint allows users to log in by using their Facebook account credentials.

Name: LogIn With GitHub
Description: Facilitates user authentication and login using GitHub's OAuth (Open Authorization) authentication system. This endpoint allows users to log in by using their GitHub account credentials.

Name: LogIn With Google
Description: Facilitates user authentication and login using Google's OAuth (Open Authorization) authentication system. This endpoint allows users to log in by using their Google account credentials.

Name: Send Verification Email
Description: Handles the verification and confirmation of the authenticity of a user's email address.

Name: Login 2FA Authentication
Description: Facilitates Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) for user authentication using user’s email and a time-based one time passcode.

Name: Confirm 2FA Authentication
Description: Confirms the Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) sent to the user

Name: Forgot Password
Description: Handles the process of resetting a user's forgotten password.

Name: LogOut
Description: Allows users to log out or terminate their current session.
